rev.comment: /* Acquisitions */ For those of us that hadn't heard of it...

On [[July 9]], [[2007]], Google announced that it had signed a definitive agreement to acquire Postini.

On [[July 9]], [[2007]], Google announced that it had signed a definitive agreement to acquire corporate spam filter firm [[Postini]].
